Key Match Events: The Memphis Grizzlies lost to the Houston Rockets 128-108
Post-Match Reflections: Taylor Jenkins criticized the team's performance, stating they 'got punked' by the Rockets and needed to respond
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies had 19 turnovers, leading to 29 points for the Rockets
Others: Ja Morant scored 24 points but shot 8-of-17 from the field
Desmond Bane, Scottie Pippen Jr., and Zach Edey also scored in double figures
